name: LaurenZside's Lucky Lunar Leap
description:
Join Lauren and smash planets throughout the universe in this exciting block puzzle game!

From the YouTube channel LaurenZside comes a new pristine encounter! Join LaurenZside as she explores a brand new world! Hundreds of never explored places! Spin the prize wheel for an extra boost in power!

JOIN LAUREN AS SHE RESEARCHES NEW WORLDS
Smash Planets, and unleash black holes as you explore the far reaches of the galaxy!

MULTIPLE WAYS TO WIN!
Check back every single day for bonus rewards like coins and boosters and spin the Daily Booster Wheel every 5 minutes for an awesome prize!

ONE HUNDRED LEVELS TO EXPLORE!
Over 100 Levels and more continually being added to LaurenZside’s Lucky Lunar Leap!

A BIG WORLD AWAITS!
Collect Pixel Hearts, Smash Cratered Moons & Swipe your way through Ice as you help Lauren navigate the galaxy!

--

LaurenZside’s Lucky Lunar Leap! is free to play but optional in-game coins can be purchased. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played LaurenZside’s Lucky Lunar Leap!
